name: Victor Kravtsov
summary: Analytics leader with over a decade of experience building and leading analytics teams, delivering pricing, promotions, competitive intelligence and assortment insights to drive GMV and profitability. Proficient in SQL/Python/ETL tools and BI platforms (Tableau, Power BI) with a track record of presenting to C-level executives and executing from scratch to full deployment.

experience.title: Analytics Lead / Competitive Analytics Team Lead
experience.description: Leading a team of 18 analysts, delivering business insights for pricing, promotions, competitive activities and GMV. Presenting results to C-level executives using Tableau; building dashboards and data marts; end-to-end analytics from scratch. Proficient in SQL/PostgreSQL/Python/Airflow/Hadoop/Kafka/Vertica/Tableau/Power BI.

experience.title: Category Business Manager
experience.description: Development and execution strategy for Home Appliances in the CIS region. Managed sales structure, assortment, pricing, marketing, PLC and P&L. Grew category GMV and profit; introduced new product type (DW).

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: DSLR & Optics product management; #1 MS in DSLR/Optics and accessories sales strategy. Led Sport Optics development and promotions; product creation in collaboration with HQ.
